```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(jsonlite)
```

```{r}

image_names <- list.files("assets/object_images")

file_paths <- paste0("assets/object_images/", image_names)

words <- substr(image_names, 1, nchar(image_names) - 5) %>%
  unique()

words <- gsub("_", " ", words)

words <- toupper(words)

image_df <- tibble(
  image_name = image_names,
  file_path = file_paths,
  word = rep(words, each = 2),
  variant = rep(c(1, 2), times = length(image_names)/2)
)


```

```{r}

JSON_images <- toJSON(image_df, auto_unbox = TRUE, pretty=pretty)
JSON_images <- paste0("var object_images = ",JSON_images,";")
write(JSON_images, file='object_images.js')

JSON_words <- toJSON(words ,auto_unbox = TRUE, pretty=pretty)
JSON_words <- paste0("var object_words = ",JSON_words,";")
write(JSON_words,file='object_words.js')

```
